templateOptions.label: ClientId
templateOptions.description: The ClientId to connect to StudyTube

templateOptions.label: ClientSecret
templateOptions.description: The ClientSecret to connect to StudyTube

templateOptions.label: BaseUrl
templateOptions.description: The URL to the StudyTube API.

templateOptions.label: TokenUrl
templateOptions.description: The URL to StudyTube for retrieving the accessToken.

templateOptions.label: Resources Page Size
templateOptions.description: Page size for Retrieving Users and Teams in the resource script. (Between 1 and 1000)

templateOptions.label: Csv user Export Path
templateOptions.description: Specifies the name and file path where the CSV user export will be saved

templateOptions.label: Csv team Export Path
templateOptions.description: Specifies the name and file path where the CSV team export will be saved
